title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 565.1 - Records for other income
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 565.1 - Records for other income

State Regulations

The records supporting the other income shall be so kept
that the utility can furnish detailed statements of the revenues from each
source and the expenses and other deductions related to such
revenues. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
565.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
